name: RouteRunner2023
description:
In this fast-paced, high-stakes racing game, players take on the role of a courier tasked with saving the world from certain doom. Set in a dystopian future where nature and technology have merged into one, players must navigate the twisted and dangerous "Roaring Machines" that have taken over the world. With the fate of the planet hanging in the balance, players must race against time to reach a critical Tree and deliver a valuable artifact that will prevent another apocalypse.

The game takes place in a sprawling and surreal world filled with towering Trees and futuristic, high-speed vehicles. Players must maneuver through the intricate network of roots and machines, dodging obstacles and enemies as they go. Along the way, they must use their driving skills and high-tech gadgets to overcome challenges and outrun competitors. Whether racing against other players or against the clock, the adrenaline-fueled gameplay will keep players on the edge of their seats.

With its unique blend of high-speed action, intricate world-building, and pulse-pounding stakes, " RouteRunner" offers a truly immersive and unforgettable experience. Whether you're a seasoned racing game veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this game is sure to leave you breathless and begging for more.

Controls:

WAD - drive

S - brake 

SpaceBar - handbrake

R - reset car

Esc - menu

X - close project
